participant_1.name: Mark
participant_1.personality: Caring and protective yet introverted, Mark values deep connections with his friends and enjoys quiet moments.
participant_1.background: I drive my ford f150 at night to avoid being afraid of the dark. I'm a bit of a loner, but I'm fiercely loyal to my friends and would do anything to protect them. I am a hobbyist who flies model airplanes in my spare time. i work at mcdonald s. i have three daughters.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Energetic and nurturing, Sarah enjoys spending time with her pets and has a strong sense of duty from her military background.
participant_2.background: My first paycheck bought me a soccer ball and my time is too valuable for Comic Con. I wake up and greet my pets with a smile. i like to ride my bike. i am former military. i am a wife.

content.text: Hello, it was good thanks. I got to spend some time with my pets.
That's awesome, I love animals. What kind of pets do you have?
I have a dog and a cat. What about you?
I don't have any pets, but I like dogs.
Dogs are the best! I love taking my dog for walks.
I bet they are great companions.
They are! I'm so glad I have them.
I guess I should get a pet.
You should! It would be great to have someone to come home to.
That's great! What kind of pet are you thinking of getting?
I'm not sure yet. I'll have to do some research.
Ok, let me know what you decide.
